printReceiptDetails() - Method in class com.sales.vo.ShoppingCart
This method returns the formatted cart information by iterating through each product and displaying the sales tax and total cost in required format
processInputFileDirectory(String) - Method in class com.sales.app.ShoppingApplication
This method is used to process the files, the inputFileDirectory will contain all the files and for each file we wll invoke processReceiptsForTax
processReceiptsForTax(File) - Method in class com.sales.app.ShoppingApplication
This method takes individual files and processes line by line, building product by calling builder.buildProduct processReceiptsForTax
Product - Class in com.sales.vo
This is a model class to hold Product information

ProductBuilder - Class in com.sales.utils
The ProductBuilder class is responsible for forming the product object, eaxh line contains the product data in file and the regex will retrieve quantity, name, price from input file.
